verbs.description: as [ARG1: emerald ash borer] [V: spreads] [ARG1: cities] ca n't plant trees fast enough st paul and minneapolis have lost tens of thousands of ash trees and the urban canopy wo n't be restored for decades plant st paul parks parks and recreation department st paul alaska parks mike hahm emerald ash borer minneapolis parks department st paul parks department jennifer thomas kevin mcdonald
